hw13
Class ImagePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  hw13.ImagePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

The ImagePanel class extends the JPanel and contains the functinality to display and modify the images.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setPasteImage

public void setPasteImage(Graph2D image)
Sets the paste image. After this method is called, the paste image is bound to the mouse and moves with it until a mouse click event.

Parameters:
image - The image to be pasted.

drawGraph2D

private void drawGraph2D(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                         java.awt.Point start,
                         Graph2D imageGraph)
Draw the provided Graph2D object to a specific location using the Graphics object g. After this call, the current image is merged with the image represented by the Graph2D object.

Parameters:
img - The BufferedImage object onto which the Graph2D image will be put.
start - The starting location of the Graph2D image.
imageGraph - The Graph2D object to be put.

mouseMoved

public void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Called when the mouse is moved on the panel. This method sets the current mouse position and initiates a repaint event for the panel.

Specified by:
mouseMoved in interface java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
Parameters:
e - THe mouse event object.
